channel.title: Polysics
channel.description:
Hey I have a thing for this type of music (I remember someone, i think paulT posted something along the lines of chu chu lovely muri muri kura kura prin prin boron bla bla bla, but i really loved that song)
Anyways i found another band which is sort of like JROCKish take a listen to there song "Electric Surfin Go Go"
They call themselves "Polysics" and there lyrics are sometimes english, sometimes japanese and sometimes random jibberish
Here is a link to their myspace (thanks to my friend) and the song playing as soon as you visit it is electric surfin go go.
http://www.myspace.com/polysicsna
So tell me what you guys think, and if you have any similar type of bands that i would enjoy =D

item.title: Polysics
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:3, topic:157751”][quote author=Casey. link=topic=215072.msg1876120#msg1876120 date=1194573571]
haaha, just listened to electric surfin go go.

I’m amused by how they sound(even thought it’s in Japanese?)

[/quote]
Not sure what language… pretty sure they just use any word that sounds good =D

The way they sound makes me happy =][/quote]
Just looked it up, its Japanese.

Read full topic
